summary: I decided that i wanted a Nicer looking companion, and Didn\'t want to have Lydia :D
descriptionHtml:
Alright,

I downloaded Skyrim Npc Editor today, and i decided to edit a companion.  I changed Uthgerd\'s face tremendously, and made her look much nicer and more attractive, rather than the \"war veteren\" looking companion.

See Screenshots for more detail (i\'m using the CBBE body and the CBBEv3M armor redesigned ebony for her.

REQUIRES APACHII SKY HAIR: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

RECOMMENDED:
Natural Eyes by nevenbridge: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589
Better Females by Bella: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
-CBBE- by Caliente: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
author: Pirogerth
